bibdata.title: IEEE Approved Draft Recommended Practice for Electrical Installations on Shipboard
Marine Sectors and Mission Systems
IEEE Approved Draft Recommended Practice for Electrical Installations on Shipboard - Marine Sectors and Mission Systems

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Recommendations for the grouping of ships and their predominant mission systems to define and highlight unique features and requirements of a ship’s electrical power system driven by the ship’s mission for classification and use by the IEEE 45(TM) series of standards

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
